description: An amazing place in the heart of the busy city. a nice quiet place for two or for a family dinner close to anyplace that is interesting in the city

reviews.txt: highly recommended! Arkadi is a meat master and definitely deservs the title for a super host! I had an amazing time and will most definitely come back!

I've heard about Arkadi's place through some of my friends and decided to give it a chance. i didn't have too many expectations but i was very surprised of his cooking abilities! Arkadi is indeed a meat master!!!

title: El Rey Del Paella
description: Bienvenido! you are more than welcome to experience the great tastes of barcelona catalonia! come drink and enjoy with us and you will have an everlasting experience!

reviews.txt: the best paella i have ever had!

title: Balkan Inpired Dinner
description: Discover an edible collection of mythological delicacies, each one with its own story, inspired by your hosts's travels to Macedonia, Montenegro, Serbia, Turkey and Greece.
tags: Discover an edible collection of mythological delicacies, each one with its own story, inspired by your hosts's travels to Macedonia, Montenegro, Serbia, Turkey and Greece.

title: Authentic Thali Lunch
description:
You are welcome to join chanchal and his wife on a traditional indian experience.
chanchal is an india born israeli and is well known for his thali 
you will be amazed by the strong and flavoured tastes of the unique combination between indian and israeli food

title: Egyptian Brunch
description: Indulge yourself in both food and knowledge all in one day! Join Ahmed and Sarah as they welcome you into their home for this tasty 4 course brunch. Ahmed will share his Egyptian culture through each home-cooked dish, supplemented with thoughtful discussion and funny anecdotes. We can also do a small Arabic lesson (we sang happy birthday for someone's birthday one time!).
tags: Indulge yourself in both food and knowledge all in one day! Join Ahmed and Sarah as they welcome you into their home for this tasty 4 course brunch. Ahmed will share his Egyptian culture through each home-cooked dish, supplemented with thoughtful discussion and funny anecdotes. We can also do a small Arabic lesson (we sang happy birthday for someone's birthday one time!).

desserts: Purple Sweet Potato Pie with Salted Chocolate Ganache

title: Modern 3 Course Dinner
description: Meet two Chefs, made of one part Baker, and one part Dietitian. Join Hosts Becky and Ben as they combine their unique food experiences at South Slope Supper Club. Enjoy an intimate, 3-course dinner surrounded by new and old friends alike. Each meal is tied together with a different theme for the evening. February is all about Loving New York. The menu below are examples of what to expect, but not the exact menu for the event.

title: Modern Caribbean Dinner
description: Get a taste of Caribbean flavors in the heart of Dallas. Join Chef Toya for a Caribbean inspired tasting menu, with touches of Japanese and Southeast Asian techniques. Hosted at a charming space in vibrant get ready to experience a unique and local selection of organic ingredients transformed into an unforgettable experience
tags: modern caribbean in the middle of the city
